control_attributes.Control: SI-7 (11) CONFINED ENVIRONMENTS WITH LIMITED PRIVILEGES
control_attributes.control_description: The organization requires that [Assignment: organization-defined user-installed software] execute in a confined physical or virtual machine environment with limited privileges.
control_attributes.Control_description: The organization requires that the integrity of [Assignment: organization-defined user-installed software] be verified prior to execution.

Control Statement: The organization requires that [Assignment: organization-defined user-installed software] execute in a confined physical or virtual machine environment with limited privileges.
Control Name: SI-7 (11) CONFINED ENVIRONMENTS WITH LIMITED PRIVILEGES
